content.rendered:
General Construction

Age-Star General Contracting Solutions Ltd

Age-Star General Contracting Solutions Ltd is a distinguished and versatile company that excels in delivering comprehensive solutions in the ﬁeld of general contracting. Renowned for its commitment to quality, precision, and client satisfaction, Age- Star brings a wealth of expertise to construction and development projects across various industries.

Contact Us
About Age Star General Construction

Vision

To be the foremost provider of general contracting solutions, recognized for our excellence, innovation, and unwavering dedication to exceeding client expectations.

Mission

Age-Star General Contracting Solutions Ltd is dedicated to delivering superior construction and development services. Our mission is to provide innovative, reliable, and cost-effective solutions that contribute to the success and longevity of our clients' projects.

What We Do?

Age-Star provides a comprehensive variety of technical and project management solutions, including engineering, procurement, and construction (EPC) services. We specialize in building construction, civil engineering, electromechanical engineering, infrastructure, temporary facilities, and facility management services for public and commercial clients in the oil and gas, power generation, health care, hotel, mining, infrastructure, and manufacturing sectors.

Who We Are

Age-Star is a well-known general contracting and building ﬁrm. We are a grade one classiﬁed contractor in all of our job disciplines, and we have been in the building and contracting business in Nigeria for over a decade.

Stella Mensah
CEO - Age Star

Satisfied Clients
HEALTH, SAFETY AND ENVIRONMENT

Our personnel at Age-Star receive regular training in emotional, physical, and mental well- being.

All personnel at Age-Star receive regular training in emotional, physical, and mental well- being.Furthermore, on-site procedures such as protective equipment, frequent inspections, and detecting and removing harmful working circumstances and practices help to ensure our workforce's safety. We keep a professional and safe working environment by providing continual training on safety procedures, personal behavior, safety discipline, accident reporting, personal protection, attention to tools and equipment, and ﬁrst aid best practices. Workplace safety is crucial at Age-Star, and providing the proper conditions and procedures for our employees will always be an important component of our business culture. That is why we aim to further develop, enhance, and polish our workers' working circumstances, and make every employee's personal safety our top priority.

QUALITY STATEMENT

Our personnel at Age-Star receive regular training in emotional, physical, and mental well- being.

All personnel at Age-Star receive regular training in emotional, physical, and mental well- being.Furthermore, on-site procedures such as protective equipment, frequent inspections, and detecting and removing harmful working circumstances and practices help to ensure our workforce's safety.We keep a professional and safe working environment by providing continual training on safety procedures, personal behavior, safety discipline, accident reporting, personal protection, attention to tools and equipment, and ﬁrst aid best practices. With our quality control program (construction phase), we ensure that all construction operations are carried out in full compliance with the construction requirements, and that all applicable standards, speciﬁcations, and technical requirements of the project are met. Our quality control managers are directly responsible for ensuring that all client and project speciﬁcations are rigorously followed. All Age-Star employees and subcontractors must adhere to the quality management system without exception.

WORKFORCE

Performance-driven ﬁrm that prioritizes the health and safety of its employees.

Age-Star is a performance-driven ﬁrm that prioritizes the health and safety of its employees. We are totally dedicated to maintaining a high degree of Nigerians and support the Federal Government of Nigeria localization program. We make signiﬁcant investments in recruiting, training, and integrating Nigeria nationals with proper qualiﬁcations into our work stream. We provide all of our workers an equal chance to fulﬁll their full career potential, as long as they meet our high quality and efﬁciency criteria. Nigeria nationals make up over 90% of our entire staff, and they work at all levels of our business, from managers to technicians and operators.

COMMITMENT TO EXCELLENCE

We gained vast knowledge in numerous functional areas of construction over the years.

Age-Star has gained vast knowledge in numerous functional areas of construction over the years, allowing us to create value for our clients through more efﬁcient design or cost savings in procurement and construction. Age-Star supports the use of cutting-edge engineering technologies and processes to effectively suit our clients' demands and project objectives. Our tried-and-true processes, guidelines, regulations, handbooks, and other assistance lay the groundwork for the effective administration of all our projects. Age-Star’s ﬁeld teams are critical to our success in construction, and their innovation assures the ﬂawless implementation of our clients' projects. To reach the greatest degree of construction perfection, we maintain tight technical and quality requirements for the ﬁeld crew.

PROJET DIVERSITY

We gained vast knowledge in numerous functional areas of construction over the years.

Age-Star's experience includes the construction of ofﬁce buildings, retail and commercial centers, housing developments, industrial complexes, hospitals and medical facilities, military and defense projects, hotels, schools and educational facilities, and storage and warehousing projects.

OUR EXPERIENCE IN CONSTRUCTION

We have wide experience in successfully executing projects of varied nature such as;

CIVIL WORKS

Heavy industrial, civil and subterranean works, pipeline civil works, all forms of heavy foundation and structural works, shore civil works, huge excavation works, high volume backﬁlling works, and so on are all examples of heavy industrial, civil and underground works.

BUILDING

Prefabricated and pre-engineered buildings for residential and commercial units in the public and private sectors, as well as reinforced concrete, precast, and steel structures

INFRASTRUCTURE

Building industrial estates, community housing and townships, onshore marine works, agricultural storage facilities, and so forth.

ELECTROMECHANICAL

Building electromechanical & plumbing works (MEP), tank fabrication and installation works, HVAC works, medium & low voltage electrical works, etc

SITE FACILITIES

Temporary and permanent; Camps, Ofﬁces, Warehouses, Workshops and Laydown Yards

Get Quick Support

Have Any Questions?
